title: Why dosent australia get 3v3
body: Hey riot i was just wondering when your going to make 3v3 constantly available on the oceanic severs, along with dominion. i mean its not like the 5v5 classic is bad it just gets abit boring and repetitive. I also have friends that will only play 3v3 because they've played for that long 5v5 no longer interests them but they love 3v3 so i was hoping if you guys could like work on that it would be cool. even if you cant a reasonable explanation would be appreciated. thanks :)

replies.body:
This has been explained 9000x by Rito. 
And Lazy feckers like yourself just post and ask rather than looking it up? 
Do you need a link or you can manage?

Also..
There is no server called "Australia"
wow ok for starters you dont need to be a dick about it and secondly i never called it australia sever >.<

If Riot didnt have to keep up appearances, they would give you an answer with a similar tone to mine..

you said: Why "dosent" australia get 3v3? 
Would you like them to segregate all summoners that play on Oceanic Server? So to ensure NZ, Pacific don't get it too?
Not enough players on the OCE server.

because riot hates us.


It's a catch 22, there isn't enough active players to justify another queue, but people get bored of the same map over and over again, meaning less active players.
look at doom bots lol, went on and off instantly lel
it really does seem that way :(
i reckon instead of making it and end of the week thing it should be on monday, wednesday, and friday

I sort of feel like it might be bc there aren't enough people on the servers for a quick matchmaking so if they release it once in a while, people will be more interested in joining the queue so it becomes faster
